original_title: John Hiatt & The Goners: Beneath This Gruff Exterior
overview: Inventive performer and poignant songwriter John Hiatt captures the attention of fans and critics alike. In this Soundstage performance, which features Dar Williams and Robinella and the CCstringband, Hiatt performs "My Baby Blue" from his most recent album Beneath This Gruff Exterior. He also showcases timeless pieces like "The Thing Called Love" and "Memphis in the Meantime."
title: John Hiatt & The Goners: Beneath This Gruff Exterior
